lead_paragraph: In a video, several players address prejudices about women’s soccer by admitting — with deadpan humor, and sometimes profanity — that they are all true.
snippet: In a video, several players address prejudices about women’s soccer by admitting — with deadpan humor, and sometimes profanity — that they are all true.
